reviews.text: SO GOOD! The tater tots are absolutely a must-have. They're closer to being croquettes, super large and almost mashed potato-y on the inside. The onion dip...

This is Pat and Gracie's new downtown location is at 121 S. High Street, Columbus, Ohio.  Also known as Pat and Gracie's Kitchen x Tavern.

I read in the...
Pat and Gracie's has come to downtown Columbus opening at 10am on Saturdays. As we could not find hours to the new location we arrived much to early, but...
